ygData.subject: Alliance Attack On the Ark
ygData.msgSnippet: The Oblitercons/Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot/Unitron/Serpentor/Oinker/Punch/Zergling: Nemesis Enforcer activated his comm. unit, sending a transmission to Dark

Date: Tue, 15 Aug 2000 17:52:03 EDT
Subject: Alliance Attack On the Ark
To: Nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 103
From: KSLawdogg@...

The Oblitercons/Nemesis 
Enforcer/Scattershot/Unitron/Serpentor/Oinker/Punch/Zergling:




Nemesis Enforcer activated his comm. unit, sending a transmission to Dark 
One.  
"Dark One, status."

<Nothing.  No attacks.  They're repairing>

"Slag!  No sign of any Predacons or anything ready to attack them?"

<No>

"Great!  That's just great...fine, attack them.  And be quick about it.  I'll 
send reinforcements to aid you in your religious crusade."

<Alright...>

The comlink ended.

"Scattershot!"

"Yes, Emperor?" 

"Assemble some troops, and send them to attack the Ark."

"Yes, Emperor."  Scattershot walked over to the intercom, speaking into it.
"All Alliance members," Scattershot's voice roared over the intercom, all 
throughout the base.  "This is Scattershot.  Nemesis Enforcer, your current 
leader, orders a strike against the Ark!  All forces assemble outside of the 
base, I repeat, all forces, assemble outside of the base!"

---

Oinker got up from his recharge bed.  "Alright, time fer sum action!" he 
yelled, running out of his room for the outside like he had been ordered.

---

Zergling got up.  "My loyalty, is at the current leaders service." he said, 
extending his claws out by 5 inches, running for where he was ordered to go.

---

Punch raised his rifle, walking out of the Alliance base, waiting.


===

Unitron was closing in on the Alliance base.  They would be able to detect 
him in ten cycles.

===

Serpentor estimated he would arrive at the Alliance base in twenty cycles.  
But he was in his cobra mode just in case things went south.


======

Dark One stood to his full height.  "Alright, that idiot wants us to open 
fire.  Pick strategic targets!"

Breakdown transformed into his artillery mode.  "I've got one.  Two idiots 
trying to repair a cannon.  Requesting permission to fire!" he yelled as his 
internal targeting systems got a lock.

"FIRE!" Dark One yelled with an evil smile.

A large shell erupted from the cannon, the explosive shell heading for the 
cannon that Rodimus Prime and Spears were attempting to repair.

---

Hiss took out his missile launcher, taking aim.  He fired off a rocket at the 
newly applied plating of the Ark.

---

Pyro transformed to his tank mode, firing off three fire balls that would 
"explode" on impact at the Ark.

---

Scavenger transformed to his HUMVEE mode, opening fire on the Ark with three 
laser blasts from his cannon, and a total of 50 explosive shells (25 from 
each machine gun mounted on his side, which is two in total).

---

Dark One transformed into his jet fighter mode, activating his engines, 
rolling on the ground.  Taking off, he turned in the air, getting in position 
to make an attack run on the scrap heap the Maximals nicknamed the Ark.
